name: default_pool
description: Default pool for tasks that don't specify a pool, with environment-specific slot limits

name: etl_pool
description: Dedicated pool for ETL workloads with optimized concurrency settings

name: data_sync_pool
description: Pool for data synchronization tasks with controlled concurrency to prevent API rate limiting

name: reporting_pool
description: Pool for reporting and analytics tasks with appropriate concurrency limits

name: high_priority_pool
description: Dedicated pool for critical and time-sensitive tasks with guaranteed resource allocation
